Sentencas: The effects of Bi-doping and Bi-deficiency of La2ZnMnO6-delta a as cathode on the electrochemical properties were studied through a complex of physical-chemical characterization.
Titulo: Bi-doped La2ZnMnO6-δ and relevant Bi-deficient compound as potential cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We synthesized a series of compounds via a Pechini route, and the phase purity was greatly influenced by the A-site composition.
Titulo: Bi-doped La2ZnMnO6-δ and relevant Bi-deficient compound as potential cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS) testified the state of oxygen species and the mixed-valent states of Bi5+/Bi3+ and Mn4+/Mn3+.
Titulo: Bi-doped La2ZnMnO6-δ and relevant Bi-deficient compound as potential cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The polarization resistances (R-p) of La2ZnMnO6-delta (LZM), La1.5Bi0.5ZnMnO6-delta (Bi-0.5) and La1.5Bi0.5-xZnMnO6-delta (Bi0.5-x, x = 0.25) are 0.122, 0.102 and 0.0760 Omega cm(2) at 850 degrees C, respectively, which are low enough to fulfill the practical application.
Titulo: Bi-doped La2ZnMnO6-δ and relevant Bi-deficient compound as potential cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: All the analytical results demonstrate that Bi-substitution on A-sites does promote conductive properties due to the existence of high ionic conductive Bi2O3 phase.
Titulo: Bi-doped La2ZnMnO6-δ and relevant Bi-deficient compound as potential cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, Bi-cation-deficient compound can further improve the transport performance because of the coexistence of Bi2O3 and Bi-cation defects.
Titulo: Bi-doped La2ZnMnO6-δ and relevant Bi-deficient compound as potential cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, these Bi-doping and Bi-cation-deficiency in LZM compounds can be promising cathode materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Bi-doped La2ZnMnO6-δ and relevant Bi-deficient compound as potential cathodes for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
